title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content: l unknown. Counsellor Florrick, the woman trapped in the fires at Waukeen's Rest, has died. Duke Ravengard's whereabouts are still unknown. We have yet to rescue anyone from the burning fires of Waukeen's Rest, including Grand Duke Ravengard. We discovered that Grand Duke Ravengard is not only an important figurehead in the city of Baldur's Gate - he is also Wyll's father. Drow abducted Grand Duke Ravengard from Waukeen's Rest and took him westward. Counsellor Florrick asked us to locate and res
